title: Moltke-class battlecruiser
summary: The Moltke class was a class of two "all-big-gun" battlecruisers[lower-alpha 1] of the German Imperial Navy built between 1909–1911. Named SMS Moltke and SMS Goeben,[lower-alpha 2] they were similar to the previous battlecruiser Von der Tann, but the newer design featured several incremental improvements. The Moltkes were slightly larger, faster, and better armored, and had an additional pair of 28 cm (11 in) guns.
